languages.text: "Футфол потряс меня в тот день, когда я впервые ступила на него... И вновь ошеломил преображенным. Отчего приведение к благочестию... так пугает?"
"Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"
languages.original_text: "Футфол потряс меня в тот день, когда я впервые ступила на него... И вновь ошеломил преображенным. Отчего приведение к благочестию... так пугает?"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"
"Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"
"Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"
"Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

languages.text: “当我第一次踏上落脚港的时候，它就让我感到震惊，如今我再次震惊地见证它的变化。为什么信仰降临在了落脚港之后，却会对它产生如此……可怕的影响？”
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: “当我第一次踏上落脚港的时候，它就让我感到震惊，如今我再次震惊地见证它的变化。为什么信仰降临在了落脚港之后，却会对它产生如此……可怕的影响？”

languages.text: « J'ai été émerveillée la première fois que j'ai posé le pied sur Castel, et de nouveau lorsque j'ai pu voir à quel point la station a été transformée. Comment est-ce possible que la dévotion puisse la rendre aussi... effrayante ? »
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été émerveillée la première fois que j'ai posé le pied sur Castel, et de nouveau lorsque j'ai pu voir à quel point la station a été transformée. Comment est-ce possible que la dévotion puisse la rendre aussi... effrayante ? »

languages.text: «Paso me pareció asombroso cuando lo visité por primera vez y vuelve a asombrarme con su transformación. Pero, ¿por qué la llegada de lo divino a la estación tiene un efecto tan... aterrador?».
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: «Paso me pareció asombroso cuando lo visité por primera vez y vuelve a asombrarme con su transformación. Pero, ¿por qué la llegada de lo divino a la estación tiene un efecto tan... aterrador?».

languages.text: 「フットフォールに初めて降り立った日は驚いたものですが、その変貌ぶりにまた驚きました。敬神の心がこのステーションにやってきたというのに、なぜこんなにも…恐ろしい結果になるのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールに初めて降り立った日は驚いたものですが、その変貌ぶりにまた驚きました。敬神の心がこのステーションにやってきたというのに、なぜこんなにも…恐ろしい結果になるのでしょう？」

languages.text: "Footfall hat mich erstaunt, als ich die Station das erste Mal betreten habe. Und ich war erneut erstaunt, ihre Verwandlung zu sehen. Warum hat die Ankunft der Göttlichkeit auf der Station eine solch ... furchterregende Wirkung gehabt?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: "Footfall hat mich erstaunt, als ich die Station das erste Mal betreten habe. Und ich war erneut erstaunt, ihre Verwandlung zu sehen. Warum hat die Ankunft der Göttlichkeit auf der Station eine solch ... furchterregende Wirkung gehabt?"

languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

languages.text: "Binliman, oraya adım atar atmaz beni büyülemeyi başarmıştı. Değiştiğini görünce yeniden büyülendim. İstasyona gelen iman... Neden böyle korkunç bir etki bıraktı?"
languages.original_text: "Footfall amazed me the day I first set foot on it, and I was amazed again to see it transformed. Why has the arrival of godliness on the station had such a... frightening effect?"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman, oraya ilk adımımı attığım anda beni büyülemişti. Değiştiğini görmek beni yeniden büyüledi. İstasyona gelen iman... Neden böyle korkunç bir etki bıraktı?"
